DataListSpec.Name: BPAlerting - Long Running Business Processes Email Alert Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing dignity health records.
DataListSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_BP_RUNNINGBUSINESSPROCESSEMAIL ( @FEEDALERT_DATAWINDOWOPEN datetime = null, @FEEDALERT_DATAWINDOWCLOSED datetime = null ) as set nocount on;
SELECT * FROM (SELECT bp.BUSPROCTYPEID as BUSPROCTYPEID, bp.BUSPROCTYPE as BUSPROCTYPE, bp.BUSPROCNAME as BUSPROCNAME, bp.STARTEDON as STARTEDON, bp.ENDEDON as ENDEDON, DATEDIFF(SECOND, bp.STARTEDON, COALESCE(bp.ENDEDON, getDATE())) as DURATION, bp.STATUS as STATUS, bp.NUMBERPROCESSED as NUMBERPROCESSED, bp.NUMBEREXCEPTIONS as NUMBEREXCEPTIONS, bp.ERRORMESSAGE as ERRORMESSAGE, stat.RUNTIMEMEAN as RUNTIMEMEAN, stat.RUNTIMESTDDEV + stat.RUNTIMEMEAN as RUNTIMESTDDEV, CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, bp.STARTEDON, coalesce(bp.endedon, getDATE())) > (stat.RUNTIMEMEAN + stat.RUNTIMESTDDEV ) THEN DATEADD(ss, stat.RUNTIMESTDDEV + stat.RUNTIMEMEAN , bp.STARTEDON) ELSE null end AS ALERTSTARTEDON, CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, bp.STARTEDON, coalesce(bp.endedon, getDATE())) > (stat.RUNTIMEMEAN + stat.RUNTIMESTDDEV ) THEN bp.ENDEDON ELSE NULL end AS ALERTENDEDON FROM (SELECT BUSPROCTYPEID, BUSPROCTYPE, BUSPROCNAME, STARTEDON, ENDEDON, NUMBERPROCESSED, NUMBEREXCEPTIONS, ERRORMESSAGE, STATUS FROM dbo.USR_V_BP_BUSINESSPROCESS WHERE STATUS = 'Running') bp LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.USR_BP_BUSINESSPROC_CUMMSTATS stat ON bp.BUSPROCTYPEID = stat.BUSPROCTYPEID AND bp.BUSPROCTYPE = stat.BUSPROCTYPENAME AND bp.BUSPROCNAME = stat.BUSPROCNAME) bpl WHERE bpl.RUNTIMEMEAN <> 0 AND ((@FEEDALERT_DATAWINDOWOPEN IS NULL AND @FEEDALERT_DATAWINDOWCLOSED IS NULL AND bpl.ALERTSTARTEDON IS NOT NULL) OR (bpl.ALERTSTARTEDON IS NOT NULL AND bpl.ALERTSTARTEDON > @FEEDALERT_DATAWINDOWOPEN AND bpl.ALERTSTARTEDON <= @FEEDALERT_DATAWINDOWCLOSED ))
